transArray.content: It's very nice. The house also upgraded the room type for us. It was originally a room with small windows, but it was upgraded to a room with large windows. At the same time, it also helped me delay check-out until 2 o'clock for free.
The hotel's reply: Your compliment is better than the sunshine, your affirmation is better than the flowers blooming, and we look forward to your stay again.
